content: Lifestyle Asked by Gabriel ThamAsked on 10 May 2019Is decathlon the cheapest place to buy sports gear?Is it really much cheaper than other sports gear shops?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardAnswered on 12 May 2019For the items that I have bought there - it does offer prices on the lower side! Things I have bought are:bicycleboxing wraps sports gearsports towelbicycle lights That said, sometimes you could have places that are closing down, and are offering really good prices on better quality stuff. In that case, I would go for that option.0 comments1

Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 10 May 2019Yes. Haha it is. But the material and lifespan of the products are usually not so good. Espcially the shoes.But you can try Queensway shopping center also, before it closes down. I recently bought tennis and futsal shoes there. Or IMM via the Outlet shops (Adidas, and Nike)0 comments0
